long_description: From urban pavement to gravel paths, the women's Cannondale Althea 3 bike keeps you sitting comfortably upright and absorbs bumps with its shock-absorbent fork. SR Suntour NEX suspension fork provides 50mm of pothole-damping suspension; suspension can be locked out when it's not needed. Hybrid design blends the speed of a road bike with the sturdy, heads-up ride of a mountain bike inspired frame; low standover height makes mounts and dismounts easy. Frame also uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to damp road vibration for a smoother ride quality. Find that just-right gear easily with the Shimano shifters, which guide the derailleurs quickly and precisely through the 24 gears. Kenda Happy Medium tires have a fast-rolling center with aggressive outside lugs for enhanced cornering traction. Platform pedals accommodate everyday shoes-just hop on and go. Frame eyelets let you outfit the bike with fenders and a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Althea 3 women's bike are subject to change.
